context: Phase 2 from Testing Infrastructure Foundation spec. Includes tasks 5-6: Create testkit package skeleton, Implement testkit mocks. Depends on: Phase 1 (Vitest configs exist). Blocks: Phase 3 (adapters need testkit mocks). COMPLETED: Package skeleton created with proper structure, all mocks implemented (K8s API, gRPC client, helpers). Testkit tests pass (5 tests).
result: Phase 2 completed successfully. Created @auxbot/testkit package with proper structure including package.json, vitest.config.ts, tsconfig.json. Implemented mocks/k8s.ts with createMockCoreV1Api() factory, mocks/grpc-client.ts with singleton get/set/resetMockPlayerClient() functions, helpers/index.ts with flushPromises() and waitFor<T>(). Added testkit to controller and worker devDependencies. Testkit tests pass (5/5).
